original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2556)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2556)@</color>召喚聖獸朱雀分身降靈，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2556)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2556)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對飛行路徑上的敵人造成傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2556)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2556)@</color> Summon the avatar of the holy beast Suzaku to descend from the spirit, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2556)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2556)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> damages enemies on the flight path.
